name: Point Of No Return (itch)
description:
I made this in 2 hours for a charity stream at PAX Australia 2018! The theme was Boss Fight, and I thought I would recount the moment before I went into the final stretch of Dragon Age: Inquisition in which I, the player, talked to my team, the video game characters I fell in love with.

This is extremely rushed and sappy and vaguely cringey and not polished (hey, 2 hours!) but the sentiment is there I think, haha! I hope you'll enjoy it!
